title: Maud Martha - chief effect of first paragraph

content.question: The chief effect of the first paragraph is to

choices.label: foreshadow the outcome of Papa’s meeting
signal that change in the family’s life is overdue
convey the women’s attachment to the house
emphasize the deteriorating condition of the house

content.answer: convey the women’s attachment to the house

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
